io.micronaut.views.thymeleaf

Class ThymeleafViewsRendererConfigurationProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.views.thymeleaf.ThymeleafViewsRendererConfigurationProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Toggleable, ThymeleafViewsRendererConfiguration

    @Requires(classes=org.thymeleaf.TemplateEngine.class)
 @ConfigurationProperties(value="micronaut.views.thymeleaf")
public class ThymeleafViewsRendererConfigurationProperties
extends Object
implements ThymeleafViewsRendererConfiguration
    ConfigurationProperties implementation of ThymeleafViewsRendererConfiguration.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergio del Amo
